name: TDF Dark
description: A dark minimalistic theme for Think Digit Forum
additional_info:
V0.7 (18 May 2015)
Polls section, bbcode code section, post reply section, smiley section, attachment section, buttons themed.

V0.6 (16 May 2015)
Advanced search box theme. And polished few other bits.

V0.5 (10 May 2015)
Major changes. Theme is 90% completed.

V0.4 (06 May 2015)
New post button is back. Unsubscribe link hidden.
Have toned down the individual post font color to be less white.

V0.3 (03 May, 2015)
Changed menu colors and forced color override for the redirect font. Added usercp menu. Content image margin set.

V0.2 (02 May, 2015)
Themed further bits. User menu and settings still WIP.

V0.1 (01 May, 2015)
Still a work in progress CSS hack. Few things are not themed.
Removed obtrusive icons and the large header at the top.
